title: Taskdn Area
description: Schema for Taskdn area file frontmatter. An Area represents an ongoing area of responsibility that is never 'finished'.

status.description: Visibility status of the area. Areas with 'active' or no status are displayed; areas with 'archived' (or other values) are hidden from default views. Values are case-sensitive and must be lowercase.

description.description: A short description of the area. Should be under 500 characters.

taskdn-type.description: Explicit type marker for mixed-content directories. If any area file has this field, files without it will be ignored.
